channel.title: Rune Rebirth 377
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/Jason.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Intro[/u][/b] This will be my [b]second last[/b] Delta project before I move on to something more complex like Hyperion or Rune Source. I'm mainly doing these last two Delta projects because I want to experiment with Delta, and bring it's potential to it's fullest. Too be honest, after I'm finished with this, I wouldn't even classify this as "Delta", because it will be so much different. I'm so excited for this project it's unbelievable, and I can't wait too get it [b]really[/b] started.
[b][u]About[/u][/b] Well, Rune Rebirth is [b]not[/b] some Runescape Remake if thats what you are thinking. I have decided to create Rune Rebirth, because I'm tired of seeing 317's with 525 Godsword animations.. or 317's with God wars maps; as a matter of fact this post puts it very well:
[quote="I Vain I"]I absolutely hate seeing 317s without 317-377 content..[/quote] But, yes back on topic, Rune Rebirth will be completely 317-377, that means [b]NO Godswords, NO Bandos, NO Dragon Claws, and NO Gay hardcoded Bounty Hunter shit alike minigames.[/b] This will not be hosted as a public server, but merely released as a server to work with. I will be the only developer, unless someone wants to join/help me with this, although I don't really need much help at all. There isn't really much to tell you other then that.
[u][b]To-Do's[/b][/u] Well, this project may take a very long time to complete, mainly because of School\Taekwondo\Leisure Time etc. Before I can even start working on the actual server, I must do lots of things to prepare it; I will strike-through it once it is completed. Basically I just have to clean out the server before I can work on it, and I don't want to use a blank base, because you can't find a decent blank delta base without the client.java being 1003094mb.
[ul][li][s]Remove all the Minigames[/s][/li] [li][s]Remove all the Quests[/s][/li] [li]Clean out the garbage can that is named "process"[/li] [li]Remove Thread Per Client[/li] [li][s]Remove all the Non-Combat Skills[/s][/li] [li][s]Clean out the classes (Go look at the "antihax" method, in a delta source)[/s][/li] [li][s]EventManager[/s][/li] [li][s]Package the server for neatness (Maybe)[/s][/li] [li][s]Lots More[/s][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] These are some basic features I hope to add once I have cleaned out the source:
[ul][li]Real Runescape Music[/li] [li]Re-Written Combat (Thanks too Deathchaos9 for telling me the places I need to edit)[/li] [li]Re-adding all the Non-Cb skills[/li] [li]Re-adding all the minigames[/li] [li]Adding custom quests[/li] [li]Working canoe system[/li] [li]Tutorial Island (I don't know if I'll do this)[/li] [li]Treasure Trails (Not sure if this was in the 377 era)[/li] [li]Lots more[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Media[/b][/u] Finally got some media;
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic1.jpg[/img]
Started on some dialogues;
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic3.jpg[/img]
Quests I plan to program;
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic4.jpg[/img]
With combat, I'm just looking at it, and seeing how it works and what it's faults are. It seems like when wL was programming combat he had no idea what he was doing;
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic5.jpg[/img]
More media will come;
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/pic6.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Minor Updates, Sunday Feb 27 2011, Preparing To Work On The Server[/u][/b]
Nothing special... added a few more quests to quest tab;
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/rsps1.jpg[/img]
Lumbridge Guide; started on tutorial island, I made it so it was optional, because I remember hating that tutorial island was mandatory; also, I know the dialogue makes no sense at all, I had changed it already, but I was too lazy to go back on the server and take another picture.
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/rsps2.jpg[/img]
Well, with the server files and such, I don't really want to package it, because the beginners that download it may have no idea where anything is, so I created a simple sorting system because I hate seeing the Class files all bunched up with the Java files, and if a more experienced person wants to download this and package it, then they can. Also, you may not recognize the class names here, because I may have changed them for Convention or because I think the file names better determine what the class does. I know it looks kinda messy now, but I don't think I actually have to neaten it up in this stage of development, it's way too early. I also created some new classes.
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/rsps3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/rsps4.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Minor Updates, Sunday; March 12; 2011, Adding Features [i][u][b]Part 1[/b][/u][/i][/u][/b]
[b]These are all the cookable foods in the Cooking skill; these foods are also [i][b]all[/b][/i] eatable.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/cookablefoods.png[/img]
[b]Working Cake/Pizza/Pie Eating, although I forgot to put the pie here.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/eating.gif[/img]
[b]Flour with water frame, if anyone needs the method I will gladly supply it.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/flourwater.gif[/img]
[b]A few dialogues.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/guard.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/priestguy.png[/img]
[b]You can now toggle music on & off, also you can listen to random types of music.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/musicnpc.png[/img]
[b]Good ol' Leveling up, I know the HP bar sprites are ugly, I'll be switching clients as soon as I enable music on the new one.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/lvlup.png[/img]
[b]Quest Points.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/questpoints.png[/img]
[b]Vial Filling, this also applies to buckets\bowls\jugs.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/vials.png[/img]
[b]Moving water, gives it a touch of detail.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/water.gif[/img]
[b]This isn't much better, but when I first got the source the item switching had this terrible delay and it raped the process method, which I don't even know why it was being used; I hope to improve this.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/switch.gif[/img]
[b]Milking a cow :P[/b]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/DivineChaosImages/milk.png[/img]
[b][u]Goals[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Achieve more stability then the other Delta's[/li] [li]Crush the statement about Delta's shitty combat[/li] [li]To Program to my fullest potential as this is my second last project[/li] [li]To prove to this community that I can program very well[/li][/ul]
I guess that's it :), if you need any more info, just send me a private message so I can add to the topic or simply just post here.

item.title: Rune Rebirth 377
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Finally have pictures, sorry for the week long wait ;), these pictures will be added to the main topic:

These are all the cookable foods in the Cooking skill; these foods are also all eatable.

Working Cake/Pizza/Pie Eating, although I forgot to put the pie here.

Flour with water frame, if anyone needs the method I will gladly supply it.

A few dialogues.


You can now toggle music on & off, also you can listen to random types of music.

Good ol’ Leveling up, I know the HP bar sprites are ugly, I’ll be switching clients as soon as I enable music on the new one.

lvlup.png761×495

Quest Points.

Vial Filling, this also applies to buckets\bowls\jugs.

vials.png760×495

Moving water, gives it a touch of detail.

This isn’t much better, but when I first got the source the item switching had this terrible delay and it raped the process method, which I don’t even know why it was being used; I hope to improve this.

Milking a cow

Although I made a lot more updates, I didn’t want to flood the topic with pictures unless you guys want me too.
For the next updates I plan to finish:

[ul][li]Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Starting Fletching[/li]
[li]Haunted House Quest, starting on Sailer Of The Lands Quest[/li]
[li]Essence Teleporting[/li]
[li]Revised Shops[/li]
[li]Picking Wheat/Onions/Potatoes[/li]
[li]Black Mark System[/li][/ul]

Also, I am fully dedicated to the 377 Theme; anything that isn’t 377 is out.

This means: Skill Capes, Dragon Boots, and any other stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Rebirth 377
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:50, topic:383982”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=479737.msg3527324#msg3527324 date=1299936832]

Perhaps with a lot of work. There is a lot of code to sort through and optimize. If you can understand the underlying flaws in winterLove derived sources than you will probably start with a different source or framework. People use these sources because they are lazy and want all the game logic added for them so they can rename it and host it.

Nevermind, I was asking wintercanon, not you sorry if it was off topic.

Doesn’t that just piss you off?
[/quote]
No, because I know he isn’t referring to me.[/quote]

item.title: Rune Rebirth 377
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

@Kaex: Yes, I plan to completely finish this, and I hope to re-write how the server accepts connections, and Combat; I may need a bit of assistance though. I am also definitely going to package it as the classes are really starting to pile up, but, for the beginners who think packaged servers are complex, I’ll give a download for the simple directory shown in the picture; also, yes I will be moving on to either RuneSource or Hyperion.

@Wintercanon: I completely understand where you are coming from, but I don’t think you understand the main point of this project; to bring back the 317-377 style servers, and to bring Deltascapes potential to it’s fullest. I want this to succeed every average Delta out there; I’m not expecting this to have stability like Hyperion and Player Rendering like RuneSource at all.
I also understand that this is going to take a very long time, and I fully committed to this project.

@m1lkman: wut

@Overall: I don’t expect this to be finished for quite some time, probably in the timer period of April-July.
Also, I’m sorry about the pictures not being here, I need to fix auto-cooking.

Read full topic

[quote=“Kaex, post:44, topic:383982”][quote author=Wintercanon link=topic=479737.msg3526248#msg3526248 date=1299844849]

Goodluck, hope your re-write delta’s horrible combat, if delta was given a new combat it’d be like project insanity and wouldn’t be hated so much.

So I recommend you carry this on and try to package your server…
If you ever do decide to move on go to RuneSource. I <3 it so I just recommend it to you.
[/quote]Anyone who has any understanding of Java knows that both DeltaScape and Project Insanity are terrible.

Anyone with a brain would know its fixable?[/quote]Perhaps with a lot of work. There is a lot of code to sort through and optimize. If you can understand the underlying flaws in winterLove derived sources than you will probably start with a different source or framework. People use these sources because they are lazy and want all the game logic added for them so they can rename it and host it.
